Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.15 Hetuduka, Micchattaniyatattika » 1.15.1 Micchattaniyatapada » 1.15.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Micchattaniyatattika
Micchattaniyatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
435.
944Hetu micchattaniyato dhammo hetussa micchattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
436.
945Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
946Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
947Nahetupaccayā adhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
948(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetu-adhipatiup1.15.2 Sammattaniyatapada >>
